home_page_title: DJ Zen Eyer | 2× World Champion Brazilian Zouk DJ & Producer
home_page_meta_desc: DJ Zen Eyer, two-time world champion (Best Remix & Best DJ Performance) at Brazilian Zouk World Championships. Book for international events.
home_subheadline: Transforming dance floors into immersive audio experiences
home_features_subtitle: Unlock exclusive benefits and be part of an engaged community
home_feat_exclusive_desc: Early access to releases and exclusive remixes
home_feat_achievements_desc: Earn XP, unlock badges, and level up
home_feat_community_desc: Connect with music lovers and DJ Zen Eyer
home_cta_title: Ready to Join the Zen Tribe?
home_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of members and transform your experience
home_hero_badge: 2× World Champion - Brazilian Zouk World Championships
home_hero_subtitle: 2× World Champion Brazilian Zouk DJ & Producer
home_bio_p1: is the world-renowned Brazilian DJ and producer specializing in Brazilian Zouk. Two-time world champion at the largest international Zouk DJ competition — winning Best Remix and Best DJ Performance, Zen Eyer has performed in over 11 countries at major Zouk congresses and festivals worldwide.
home_bio_p2: Known for his slow, sensual, and deeply "creamy" style, he rejects fast BPMs and advocates that true connection in dance only happens when the body has time to melt. His signature audio tag "Zen… Zen… Zen… Zen… Eyer… Eyer… Eyer… Eyer…" has become a trademark on dance floors worldwide.
home_bio_p3: Creator of the reZENha event series and the Tribo Zen (Zen Tribe) movement, Zen Eyer is not just a DJ: he is the ideological leader of the new generation of Brazilian Zouk that prioritizes connection, presence, and pleasure over acrobatics and speed.
home_festivals_subtitle: Recognized at major Zouk events worldwide
home_press_desc: Complete press kit, high-resolution photos, releases, and interviews available.
home_booking_desc: Available for congresses, festivals, workshops, and exclusive events in Brazil and abroad.
home_tribe_subtitle: No rush here. Just prolonged melting.
home_bio_intro: DJ Zen Eyer (Marcelo Eyer Fernandes) is a global reference in Brazilian Zouk. Two-time world champion (Best Remix and Best DJ Performance) at the Brazilian Zouk World Championships, he transforms dance floors into immersive experiences for over a decade.
home_bio_style: Known for his "creamy" and engaging style, Zen prioritizes connection. No rush. His signature drop "Zen… Zen… Zen… Eyer… Eyer…" is already a classic at festivals.
home_bio_mensa: Member of Mensa International, he creates perfect emotional journeys for the "flow" in dance. Explore the Music or Events tab.

zenTribe.levelUpDesc: The Zen Tribe features a comprehensive achievement system that rewards you for engaging with music, attending events, and being an active community member.

media_page.title: Media & Press Kit
media_page.subtitle: Official media resources and press information for DJ Zen Eyer
media_page.world_champion_desc: Marcelo Eyer, known as DJ Zen Eyer, is a two-time World Champion in Brazilian Zouk, bringing unique energy to dance floors worldwide.
media_page.international_performances_desc: DJ Zen Eyer has performed at major festivals and events across Brazil, Europe, and the Americas, specializing in Brazilian Zouk music.
media_page.high_res_photos_desc: Professional photos for press and promotional use
media_page.official_bio_desc: Complete artist bio in multiple languages
media_page.press_kit_pdf_desc: Downloadable press kit with full information
media_page.press_inquiries_desc: For press inquiries, interviews, or media requests, please contact our press office:

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.subtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy_page.introduction: DJ Zen Eyer (Marcelo Eyer Fernandes, CNPJ: 44.063.765/0001-46) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.
privacy_page.introduction_consent: By using our website, you consent to the data practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the website.
privacy_page.info_collect_personal: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
privacy_page.info_collect_usage: Usage data and analytics (pages visited, time spent, interactions)
privacy_page.info_collect_device: Device information (browser type, operating system, IP address)
privacy_page.info_collect_cookies: Cookies and tracking technologies for enhanced user experience
privacy_page.info_collect_payment: Payment information (processed securely through third-party processors)
privacy_page.how_we_use_provide: To provide and maintain our services
privacy_page.how_we_use_notify: To notify you about changes to our services
privacy_page.how_we_use_support: To provide customer support and respond to inquiries
privacy_page.how_we_use_emails: To send promotional emails and newsletters (with your consent)
privacy_page.how_we_use_analyze: To analyze usage patterns and improve our website and services
privacy_page.how_we_use_security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
privacy_page.data_security_measures: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data
privacy_page.data_security_ssl: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
privacy_page.data_security_audits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
privacy_page.data_security_access: Restricted access to personal information on a need-to-know basis
privacy_page.data_security_disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure
privacy_page.data_sharing_no_sell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties
privacy_page.data_sharing_service: We may share data with trusted service providers who assist in operations
privacy_page.data_sharing_legal: We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights
privacy_page.data_sharing_analytics: Analytics partners may receive aggregated, anonymized data
privacy_page.data_sharing_payment: Payment processors handle transaction data according to their own policies
privacy_page.your_rights_access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy_page.your_rights_correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy_page.your_rights_deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations)
privacy_page.your_rights_optout: Opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time
privacy_page.your_rights_portability: Data portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
privacy_page.cookies_desc: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier.
privacy_page.cookies_control: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website.
privacy_page.third_party_desc: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our services, provide services on our behalf, or assist us in analyzing how our service is used. These third parties may have access to your personal information to perform tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
privacy_page.lgpd_intro: We comply with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados). As a Brazilian entity, we are committed to:
privacy_page.lgpd_lawful: Processing data lawfully, fairly, and transparently
privacy_page.lgpd_purpose: Collecting data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes
privacy_page.lgpd_accurate: Keeping data accurate and up to date
privacy_page.lgpd_retention: Retaining data only as long as necessary
privacy_page.changes_desc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy_page.contact_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

terms_page.title: Terms of Use
terms_page.subtitle: Read the terms and conditions governing the use of our services.
terms_page.introduction: Welcome to the official website of DJ Zen Eyer (Marcelo Eyer Fernandes, CNPJ: 44.063.765/0001-46). These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our website, services, and content.
terms_page.introduction_agreement: By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.
terms_page.acceptance_desc: By accessing and using this website (djzeneyer.com), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, please do not use this website. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and such modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting on this website.
terms_page.license_desc: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials (information or software) on DJ Zen Eyer's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not: (a) modify or copy the materials; (b) use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial); (c) attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on DJ Zen Eyer's website; (d) remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or (e) transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.
terms_page.disclaimer_desc: The materials on DJ Zen Eyer's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. DJ Zen Eyer makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
terms_page.limitations_desc: In no event shall DJ Zen Eyer or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on DJ Zen Eyer's website, even if DJ Zen Eyer or a DJ Zen Eyer authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
terms_page.ip_content: All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, and software, is the property of DJ Zen Eyer (Marcelo Eyer Fernandes) or its content suppliers.
terms_page.ip_protected: The content is protected by Brazilian and international copyright laws.
terms_page.ip_unauthorized: Unauthorized use of any materials may violate copyright, trademark, and other laws.
terms_page.ip_reproduce: You may not reproduce, distribute, display, or create derivative works without express written permission.
terms_page.conduct_lawful: You agree not to use the website for any unlawful purpose or in any way that interrupts, damages, or impairs the service.
terms_page.conduct_access: You will not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the website.
terms_page.conduct_bots: You will not use automated systems (bots, scrapers) without permission.
terms_page.conduct_malware: You will not upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code.
terms_page.conduct_respect: You will respect the privacy and rights of other users.
terms_page.purchases_availability: All purchases are subject to availability and confirmation of payment.
terms_page.purchases_prices: Prices are subject to change without notice.
terms_page.purchases_cancel: We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order.
terms_page.purchases_processing: Payment processing is handled by secure third-party processors.
terms_page.purchases_refunds: Refund and cancellation policies are outlined at the time of purchase.
terms_page.accounts_confidential: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms_page.accounts_responsibility: You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_page.accounts_accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.
terms_page.accounts_suspend: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms_page.accounts_notify: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms_page.links_contain: This website may contain links to third-party websites.
terms_page.links_no_control: DJ Zen Eyer has no control over and assumes no responsibility for third-party content.
terms_page.links_no_endorsement: The presence of links does not imply endorsement.
terms_page.links_risk: You access third-party sites at your own risk.
terms_page.links_review: Please review the terms and privacy policies of any third-party sites.
terms_page.law_brazil: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Brazil, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any legal action or proceeding arising under these terms will be brought exclusively in the courts located in São Paulo, Brazil.
terms_page.law_consent: By using this website, you consent to the jurisdiction and venue of such courts in São Paulo, Brazil.
terms_page.modifications_desc: DJ Zen Eyer reserves the right to revise these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use this website after changes are posted, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our terms.
terms_page.questions_desc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:
terms_page.acceptance_footer: By using this website, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms of Use and agree to be bound by them.

conduct_page.title: Code of Conduct
conduct_page.subtitle: Learn about our expectations and standards for respectful behavior.
conduct_page.commitment_intro: DJ Zen Eyer is committed to creating a welcoming, safe, and inclusive environment for all members of our community. This Code of Conduct applies to all interactions within our community, including events, online platforms, and any spaces associated with DJ Zen Eyer.
conduct_page.commitment_participation: By participating in our community, you agree to abide by this Code of Conduct. We expect all community members to help create a positive environment where everyone feels respected and valued.
conduct_page.respect_desc: Treat everyone with respect, kindness, and empathy. We celebrate diversity and welcome people of all backgrounds, identities, and experiences.
conduct_page.community_desc: We are a community built on the love of Brazilian Zouk and music. Support each other, share knowledge, and help create a positive environment.
conduct_page.safety_desc: Everyone deserves to feel safe and comfortable. Consent is paramount in all interactions, both online and at events.
conduct_page.safety_speak: Speak up if you feel uncomfortable
conduct_page.prohibited_intro: The following behaviors are strictly prohibited and will result in consequences as outlined below:
conduct_page.harassment_1: Any form of harassment based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, disability, age, religion, or any other protected characteristic
conduct_page.harassment_2: Sexual harassment, unwanted advances, or inappropriate comments
conduct_page.disruptive_1: Spam, trolling, or deliberately derailing conversations
conduct_page.disruptive_3: Promoting hate groups or extremist ideologies
conduct_page.disruptive_4: Engaging in illegal activities or promoting illegal content
conduct_page.privacy_1: Sharing someone's personal information without consent (doxxing)
conduct_page.privacy_2: Recording or photographing people without permission
conduct_page.privacy_4: Impersonating others or creating fake accounts
conduct_page.reporting_intro: If you experience or witness behavior that violates this Code of Conduct, please report it immediately. All reports will be treated with confidentiality and seriousness.
conduct_page.reporting_events: At events: Speak to event staff or organizers immediately
conduct_page.reporting_online: Online: Use the report function on the platform
conduct_page.reporting_acknowledge: We will acknowledge receipt within 24-48 hours
conduct_page.reporting_investigate: We will investigate the incident thoroughly and impartially
conduct_page.reporting_action: We will take appropriate action based on our findings
conduct_page.reporting_followup: We will follow up with you about the outcome (as appropriate)
conduct_page.enforcement_intro: Violations of this Code of Conduct may result in the following consequences, depending on the severity and frequency of the violation:
conduct_page.consequence_first_desc: Verbal or written warning with explanation of the violation
conduct_page.consequence_repeated_desc: Temporary removal from events, platform, or community spaces
conduct_page.consequence_severe_desc: Permanent removal from all DJ Zen Eyer events and community spaces
conduct_page.scope_intro: This Code of Conduct applies to all spaces managed by DJ Zen Eyer, including but not limited to:
conduct_page.scope_online: Online communities and social media groups
conduct_page.scope_representing: Any space representing DJ Zen Eyer
conduct_page.contact_intro: If you have questions about this Code of Conduct or need to report a violation:
conduct_page.acknowledgment: By participating in our community, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to follow this Code of Conduct and understand the consequences of violations.
conduct_page.together: Together, we create a better community.
